DOC.brief_summary: a. VEGFRs may be the biomarker which can predict the effect of bevacizumab in non small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: VEGFRs Predict Bevacizumab Benefit in Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: 1. non small cell lung cancer (non squamous carcinoma) 2. ECOG 0-1 3. from 18-75 years old
DOC.criteria: non squamous cell non small cell lung cancer with measurable disease ECOG 01 patients received surgery in recent 4 weeks
